property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Dragons. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play {GACHINKO JUDGE}. If you win,destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 12000 or less ({GACHINKO JUDGE}: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.) ■ In Gachinko Judge, your revealed Dragon cards cost 8 more. {TRIPLE BREAKER}
